title: Li Jin Explains How Creators only need 100 TRUE FANS
description:
In the 9th episode of Creator Economics, Reed and Blake interview Li Jin on the Passion Economy. The philosophy that ANYONE can create a business doing what they love. This involves creating platforms designed to empower the individual and help them cultivate a dedicated audience.

Where you can find Li Jin:  

Means of Creation: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCssD_lb5-VivYtAp07bQ-uQ   

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ljin18
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
